title: Minecraft 1.6.2 Cracked with OptiFine FPS Boost & Working So
description:
- To install, first click your start button and search %appdata% This will open the Roaming folder.

(**Optional - Copy your existing .minecraft folder from %appdata% to your desktop or wherever to reatin your previous version of minecraft. Swap .minecraft folders to change MC versions.**)


- Copy the new .minecraft folder into the Roaming folder opened after searching %apptada%. 

- Open the new .minecraft folder (the one placed in %appdata%), then run Minecraft.exe, give it a minute or two to load the proper config since it is it's first time running. *Some users may have to wait up to 5 minutes, depending on your machine specs.

- IMPORTANT>>>>>>>You might need to resize the minecraft window to be able to see the box where you input your username. Not my doing :( just something I noticed.

- Enter your username in the Username box. Then next to Version, choose 1.6.2

- Click "Play" :p

-Enjoy Minecraft 1.6.2 with OptiFine, and working sound!


Viva Alanthya!!

-astr1al


Tested working. Please verify in comments. :)
